node.title: Nijisanji’s Lie:verse Liars Mixed Media Project Releases First Novel Serialization
node.description: Lie:verse Liars—a mixed media project by VTuber agency Nijisanji, media conglomerate KADOKAWA, and graphic design company BALCOLONY—has revealed the first release from the project, a light novel titled “Lie:verse Liars: How to Start a Bad End That Will Make Us Happy.”
